Google Ads:finding customers faster

We take full responsibility with taking payment for the increase in conversions only

Google Ads offers you a wide range of ways to promote your business

Show ads on Search

Promote your company to those who are actively searching Google for the products and services you offer. This will help you attract potential clients, customers and website visitors.

Draw attention

Increase your brand awareness and users' willingness to buy by showing them colourful and memorable ads when they visit websites, check email in Gmail or use mobile apps.

Promote your range of products

Show adverts to users who are ready to buy. Offer them suitable products that are available.

Tell your brand story in a video

Build brand awareness, appeal to those who have already seen your adverts, and attract potential customers who watch or search for YouTube videos.

Promote your app

Reach out to those who like apps similar to yours. This way you will get more installs, keep your users interested and stimulate action on the app.

Cost of setting up and managing Google Ads

The final cost is calculated on an individual basis after a briefing and project evaluation.

What is included in the service

    Testing of 10 hypotheses per month
    Clear and informative reporting

    There is a fixed and variable part of the fee
The plan is developed individually for the project. Depending on the business need, in case a certain type of advertising is not required, hours are allocated to prioritised advertising and the volume of key phrases is increased.

Google technologies for your business

Show adverts to customers at the right time

Show your ads at the right time in the massive Google Ads ecosystem. Google's artificial intelligence selects the most effective ad formats across YouTube, the search network and Google recommendations to maximise conversions.

Tracking, learning and optimising for the highest return on investment

Track conversions to get useful audience statistics. Google's automatic budget optimisation features help you attract new customers at the highest ROI.

Monitor the budget

Get recommendations, set a monthly budget and change it at any time. Google's technology can help you measure results and make the most of your advertising dollars.

Frequent questions about split-testing

  • What are the service rates?

    We calculate the cost of our services based on the budget you plan to spend on advertising and the guarantees we include in the contract.

  • Who is responsible for the creatives for the campaign?

    We work with the client's creatives. We also develop our own. We make as many creatives as necessary to test all the experts' hypotheses. We do both static and dynamic, including video. We calculate the cost of our services based on the budget you plan to spend on advertising and the guarantees we include in the contract.

  • I already have campaigns running. Is there room for improvement?

    Yes, we can. We are often approached with existing campaigns and the work of rebuilding or creating new campaigns is a fundamental task for the team. We start by reviewing existing campaigns, highlighting strengths and weaknesses and making recommendations to optimise targeting, bids and ads. Our favourite job is turning good into great.

  • Do you have any case studies in my area of interest?

    Our agency has been working in performance marketing for 17 years. During this time we have gained experience in all the key niches. Our clients include banks, car dealers, dentists, transport companies, furniture stores, game and app developers. On the website you can see some of the cases we have worked on. The manager will select and show you projects that are as close as possible to your business.

Detailed audit

If your advertising campaign is not paying off, you want to supervise a contractor or a specialist in the company, to improve current performance - come to us for an audit. We conduct a complete and thorough audit

  • Settings, bids and
  • Adverts and values in them
  • Adjustments for age, gender, and 16 other checkpoints
  • Ineffective sites and phrases
Request an audit fee

Anti-fraud

Brand Safety

Restrict display locations next to sensitive content if it doesn't align with your brand's policies or values

More info

Anti-Fraud

Protection from real-time scrolling and click-baiting. Screens out robots and you only pay for contact with real users

More info

Payment for visible displays only

We will count the display if at least 50% of the clip is in the line of sight of the user for at least 1 second for a static banner (2 seconds for a video).
